text: Rocky Balboa (also known as Rocky VI) is the sixth film in the Rocky series, written, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. It is also the sequel to Rocky V. ==References== Category:2006 drama movies Category:2000s sports drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Rocky movies Category:Screenplays by Sylvester Stallone Category:Movies directed by Sylvester Stallone
title: Rocky Balboa (movie)
